thread.title: Rachel
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by Rachel

author: Rachel
title: Rachel
text: After 5-years of our mirrored TV hanging in our living room, I forgot to tell the painters that it was not just a mirror. We needed to do a couple of repairs when they yanked it off the wall, but it looks as amazing as ever today. Guests are always so surprised and delighted when they realize what it is. We have 4 children - from 11 years old to 15 months - so we use every trick in the books to keep their things organized, accessible and yet out of sight. This is by far the best of those tricks - you'd never know that cartoons had been blasting from the mirror just minutes before company arrived.
